price: "Bai zama kõwa ba fãce namiji, ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ga Allah, kuma ba mu zama, sabõda shi, mãsu ĩmãni ba."
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُۥ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban wamā naḥnu lahu bimu'minīna
